title: IIT Mandi Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Junior Research Fellow and Project Associate Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Mandi (IIT Mandi) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Junior Research Fellow and Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Mandi Notification 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for t...
